mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_event (gathering_id, event_title, event_start_date, event_end_date, allday_yn, event_description) values (#{gatheringId}, #{eventTitle}, TO_DATE(#{eventStartDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{eventEndDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'), #{alldayYn}, #{eventDescription})
